original_title: 赤いスキャンダル　情事
overview: Roman Porno from 1982. A young university associate professor sells her body as a high-class prostitute while her husband is away, despite being in a calm relationship. The husband, while turning a blind eye to the behavior of such a wife, begins to feel a masochistic pleasure, and two people connect with a mysterious marital love.
tagline: When the chaste wife first learned of ecstasy...
title: Red Scandal: Affair
